The player recovered all the lost technological secrets of the pre-Collapse era.
The player successfully won a game that was explicitly designed to be unwinnable.
The player successfully negotiated their own resurrection from the dead.
The player has destroyed all sources of dark magic in the world.
The player successfully fulfilled every contradictory clause in the ancient contract.
The player achieved total victory on the very first turn of the game.
The player's single discovery doubled the entire known size of the universe.

Summary Title: God of War Lays Down Arms
Full Victory Condition Statement: The player successfully convinced the god of war to lay down their arms forever.
The player's final decision resulted in a perfect Nash equilibrium for all players.
The player successfully rescued all 7 people/animals from the burning structure.
The player is the first to obtain all 6 designated landmarks for their city.
The player achieved victory by surviving 20 rounds of the Ticking Clock loss condition.
The player succeeded in building a new civilization without any form of currency.
The player successfully performed the trick that defies all established magical laws.
The player successfully convinced the hostile force that the war was not worth the cost.
The player has successfully created a permanent peace among animals and humans.
The player successfully engineered a perpetual motion machine.
The player's legacy is guaranteed to be remembered for 10,000 generations.
The player successfully collected and utilized all 12 types of magical herbs.
The player achieved victory by using the weakest available starting character.
The player successfully restored the ancient king to his rightful throne.
The player managed to avoid detection by the enemy scout unit for the entire game.
The player successfully established a truly sustainable society in all respects.
The player's final move was judged to be the most beautiful and elegant play possible.
The player successfully prevented the domino effect of cascading failures.

Summary Title: Only Civ Left on Home Planet
Full Victory Condition Statement: The player's civilization is the only one left standing on the home planet.
The player's current success proves the Refusal of Origins (the fifth origin) is the ultimate defining identity.
The player successfully rewrote the Source Code of the game world to reflect a truly just society.

Summary Title: Game Can Never Be Played Again
Full Victory Condition Statement: The player won by choosing the only option that guaranteed the game could never be played again.
The player successfully communicated the exact coordinates of their own location to the player controlling the game.
The player achieved victory by having their entire story designated as a Warning rather than a triumph.
The protagonist's ultimate realization was that they are an inhabitant of a simulation and they accepted this fact.
The player achieved victory by performing the one action the game's developer stated was unintended.
The player's single act in the past eliminated the main antagonist before they could commit their first crime.
The player successfully lived an entire second lifetime without altering a single event in the new timeline.
The player won the great war by successfully convincing the enemy's historical founder to pursue peace.
The final truth statement is one that is true in the past, false in the present, and true in the future.
The player achieved victory by returning from the future to deliver an item that subsequently disappears forever.
The player achieved Wabi-Sabi by finding and appreciating the profound, imperfect beauty in the flawed game world.
The player successfully achieved Ubuntu by defining their self-worth entirely through the service of others.
The player achieved the ultimate goal by completing the task with the least effort, demonstrating the value of Wu Wei (effortless action).
The player's state is one of perfect Dharmic balance where societal order and justice are permanently maintained.
The player demonstrated the correct path by successfully walking the Eightfold Path to achieve total enlightenment.
The player's triumph is a victory of collective survival over individual glory.
The player achieved victory by ensuring that every member of the opposing faction was able to find safe refuge.
The player successfully won the right to retire and pursue a life of pure contemplation and intellectual freedom.
The player's success came from an unbreakable commitment to Ahimsa (non-violence) in all circumstances.

Summary Title: First To Run Out Of Assets
Full Victory Condition Statement: The player won by being the first to run out of all forms of currency and accumulated assets.
The player successfully managed their resources to achieve zero growth over 100 turns, preserving stability.
The player's logic chain convinced the primary opponent to voluntarily drop their win condition.
The player completed the entire game having only traveled within the boundaries of their initial starting space.
